meanings.definition: A cup-like structure in a flower that surrounds the base of the corolla.
meanings.sent1: The calycle of the flower held the petals together.
meanings.sent2: The calycle protected the delicate petals of the flower.
meanings.sent3: The calycle decided to throw a party for the petals.
meanings.sent4: The calycle embraced the petals like a mother protecting her children.
meanings.sent5: The calycle cradled the petals gently, like a nest for birds.

meanings.definition: A series of bracts subtending a flower head.
meanings.sent1: The calycle around the flower head added extra protection.
meanings.sent2: The calycle of bracts enhanced the beauty of the flower head.
meanings.sent3: The calycle of bracts told jokes to the flower head.
meanings.sent4: The calycle of bracts was a crown for the flower head.
meanings.sent5: The calycle of bracts encircled the flower head like a loyal guard.
